name: Enchanted Sword
description: A magical sword imbued with powerful enchantments.
looks: The sword has a shining silver blade with intricate runes etched into its surface. The hilt is made of polished ebony and adorned with a sparkling gemstone.

special_effects.elemental_damage: Adds additional fire damage to attacks

name: Bow of Ice
description: A bow that shoots arrows infused with ice magic.
looks: The bow has a sleek design with a blue and silver color scheme. The limbs of the bow are made of a translucent ice-like material, and the grip is wrapped in soft white leather.

special_effects.freeze: Arrows have a chance to freeze the target, slowing them down.

name: Elven Bow
description: A beautifully crafted bow made by elven artisans.
looks: The Elven Bow is made from the finest materials, with a sleek and elegant design. It has intricate engravings of nature and elven symbols, and is adorned with delicate vines and leaves.

special_weapon_skills.Archery: Increases accuracy and damage with bows.

special_effects.Precision Shot: Allows for a precise shot that deals extra damage to a target's weak point.

name: Enchanted Bow
description: A mystical bow infused with ancient magic.
looks: The bow is crafted from ethereal wood and glows with a soft blue light. The string is made of pure moonlight, adding to the enchanting appearance.

special_weapon_skills.Bow Mastery: Increases accuracy and damage with bows.

name: Steel Longsword
description: A sturdy longsword made of steel.
looks: The longsword has a polished steel blade with a double-edged design. The hilt is wrapped in leather for a comfortable grip.

name: Sword of Flames
description: A legendary sword that burns with the power of fire.
looks: The Sword of Flames has a fiery blade that flickers and dances with flames. The hilt is made of obsidian and adorned with ruby gemstones.

special_effects.burning_strike: Has a chance to set the target on fire, dealing additional fire damage over time.

name: Staff of Healing
description: A staff infused with powerful healing magic.
looks: The staff is made of polished oak and has a glowing crystal at the top. It emits a soft white light.

special_effects.healing_aura: Emits a healing aura that gradually restores health to nearby allies.

name: Silver Dagger
description: A small, lightweight dagger made of silver.
looks: The dagger has a sleek silver blade with a pointed tip and a hilt wrapped in black leather.

special_effects.silver_enchantment: Deals additional damage to undead and supernatural creatures.

name: Scepter of Healing
description: A magical scepter that radiates healing energy.
looks: The scepter is made of pure ivory and has a golden band near the top. It glows with a soft, golden light.

special_effects.healing_aura: Emits an aura that heals nearby allies over time.

name: Emerald Ring
description: A beautiful ring adorned with a sparkling emerald.
looks: The ring features a large emerald gemstone set in a silver band. The gemstone glows with a vibrant green hue.
